original_text: Though you have not seen him, you love him; and even though you do not see him now, you believe in him and are filled with an inexpressible and glorious joy,
korean_text: 예수를 너희가 보지 못하였으나 사랑하는도다 이제도 보지 못하나 믿고 말할 수 없는 영광스러운 즐거움으로 기뻐하니

sentences.original_text: Though you have not seen him
and even though you do not see him now
and are filled with an inexpressible and glorious joy
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 표현할 수 없는 영광스러운 기쁨으로 가득 찬다
